twc_daily.narrative: Showers and thunderstorms late. Lows overnight in the mid 70s.
Thunderstorms. Highs in the mid 80s and lows in the mid 70s.
Thunderstorms early. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the mid 70s.
A few thunderstorms possible. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the mid 70s.
Mix of sun and clouds. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the mid 70s.
Thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the mid 70s.
Slight chance of a thunderstorm. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the mid 70s.

nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 90, with temperatures falling to around 86 in the afternoon. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 75. Southeast wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tuesday
nws_periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 7am, then showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 86. Southeast wind 0 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tuesday Night
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 4am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 75. South wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
